creditline: Gift from the Helen D. Ling Collection in celebration of the 100th anniversary of the Minneapolis Institute of Art
description: album with 15 paintings of children involved in various playtime activities; 14 calligraphic text pages; label with text and two red seals on cover; wood-edged covers with purple, green and yellow silk brocade

title: Children at Play
